form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Toomey (for himself and Mr. Pryor) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

form.official-title: To amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, to make the shareholder threshold for registration of savings and loan holding companies the same as for bank holding companies.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Holding Company Registration Threshold Equalization Act of 2013.

section.header: Registration threshold for savings and loan holding companies
section.text: The Securities Exchange Act of 1934 (15 U.S.C. 78a et seq.) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in paragraph (1)(B), by inserting after is a bank the following: , a savings and loan holding company (as such term is defined in section 10 of the Home Owners' Loan Act),; and

clause.text: by inserting after case of a bank the following: , a savings and loan holding company (as such term is defined in section 10 of the Home Owners' Loan Act),; and

paragraph.text: in section 15(d) (15 U.S.C. 78o(d)), by striking case of bank and inserting the following: case of a bank, a savings and loan holding company (as such term is defined in section 10 of the Home Owners' Loan Act),.
